name: xstruct
description: Implementation of straightforward extraction of structured data from web pages.

scripts.test: coffee -co js . && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive js/tests -R spec -r should -t 10000 && cp README.md package.json js/ && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Constantin Titarenko
